languages.text: {n}Пламя пылает высоко, ибо в основе его доброе топливо. Эти люди скопили много обид. Блюстители жестоки с ними, ибо верят, что страх искореняет измену. Офицеры презирают их, ибо одежда и руки их грязны. Интенданты обирают их и утаивают причитающееся им, ибо клан их недостаточно силен, чтобы требовать. Они уязвимы. Их сердца уязвимы. Неумирающий повелел ткачам плести сеть, чтобы ловить такие сердца, падающие в бездну измены. И я плету сеть.{/n}

{n}The flame burns high, for there is strong fuel at its heart. These people have amassed many grievances. The enforcers are cruel to them, for they believe that fear eradicates treason. The officers despise them, for their clothes and hands are filthy. The quartermasters rob them and withhold what is owed to them, for their clan is not strong enough to make demands. They are vulnerable. Their hearts are vulnerable. The Undying One commands us to spin a web to catch such hearts before they plunge into the abyss of treason. And so, I am spinning the web.{/n}

Офицеры презирают их, ибо одежда и руки их грязны. Интенданты обирают их и утаивают причитающееся им, ибо клан их недостаточно силен, чтобы требовать. Они уязвимы. Их сердца уязвимы. Неумирающий повелел ткачам плести сеть, чтобы ловить такие сердца, падающие в бездну измены. И я плету сеть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The flame burns high, for it has good fuel at its heart. These people have amassed many grievances. The enforcers are cruel to them, for they believe that fear eradicates treason. The officers despise them, for their clothes and hands are filthy. The overseers rob them and withhold what is owed to them, for their clan is not strong enough to make demands. They are vulnerable. Their hearts are vulnerable. The Undying One commanded the weavers to spin a net to catch such hearts before they plunge into the abyss of treason, and so I am spinning the net.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Flamme ist hoch, denn das Brennmaterial in ihrem Herzen ist stark. In diesen Leuten hat sich viel Frustration angesammelt. Die Enforcer sind grausam zu ihnen, weil sie glauben, dass Angst jeden Verrat erstickt. Die Offiziere verachten sie, weil ihre Kleidung und Hände schmutzig sind. Die Quartiermeister berauben sie und halten zurück, was ihnen zusteht, weil ihr Clan nicht stark genug ist, Forderungen durchzusetzen. Sie sind verwundbar. Ihre Herzen sind verwundbar. Der Todlose befiehlt uns, ein Netz zu spinnen, um solche Herzen einzufangen, bevor sie sich in den Abgrund des Verrats stürzen. Und so spinne ich nun dieses Netz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las llamas son altas, pues su combustible es fuerte. Esta gente ha acumulado muchos agravios. Los guardias son crueles con ellos, pues creen que el miedo erradica la traición. Los oficiales los detestan, pues sus ropas y manos están sucias. Los intendentes les roban y retienen lo que se les debe, pues su clan no es lo bastante fuerte para exigir nada. Son vulnerables. Sus corazones son vulnerables. El Inmortal nos ordena tejer una red que atrape estos corazones antes de que caigan al abismo de la traición. Eso es lo que estoy haciendo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flame burns high, for there is strong fuel at its heart. These people have amassed many grievances. The Undying One commands us to spin a web to catch such hearts before they plunge into the abyss of treason. And so, I am spinning the web.{/n}

languages.text: {n}炎は高く燃え上がる。その中心に強力な燃料があるせいだ。彼らには多くの不満が溜まっている。恐怖が反乱を潰すと信じて、エンフォーサーたちは彼らを酷く扱うのだ。エンフォーサーは、服と手が不潔という理由で彼らを下に見ている。彼らの一族は声をあげるほどの力がなく、補給係は彼らの所有物を奪って与えない。彼らは傷つきやすい。そう、心が傷つきやすいのだ。不死の者は私達に網を紡いで、そのような心を絡みとり、彼らが反逆の奈落の底に落ちる前に助けろと命じられた。だから私は網を紡ぐ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flame burns high, for there is strong fuel at its heart. These people have amassed many grievances. The enforcers are cruel to them, for they believe that fear eradicates treason. The officers despise them, for their clothes and hands are filthy. The quartermasters rob them and withhold what is owed to them, for their clan is not strong enough to make demands. They are vulnerable. Their hearts are vulnerable. The Undying One commands us to spin a web to catch such hearts before they plunge into the abyss of treason. And so, I am spinning the web.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}炎は高く燃え上がる。その中心に強力な燃料があるせいだ。彼らには多くの不満が溜まっている。恐怖が反乱を潰すと信じて、エンフォーサーたちは彼らを酷く扱うのだ。エンフォーサーは、服と手が不潔という理由で彼らを下に見ている。彼らの一族は声をあげるほどの力がなく、補給係は彼らの所有物を奪って与えない。彼らは傷つきやすい。そう、心が傷つきやすいのだ。不死の者は私達に網を紡いで、そのような心を絡みとり、彼らが反逆の奈落の底に落ちる前に助けろと命じられた。だから私は網を紡ぐ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}烈焰熊熊燃烧，燃料非常充足。这些人积怨已久。执法者折磨他们，因为执法者坚信恐惧可以消灭忤逆；军官蔑视他们，因为他们穿着破衣烂衫，浑身脏污。军需官剥削他们，克扣本该属于他们的东西，因为他们的氏族不够强大，无权讨价还价。他们脆弱不堪，他们的心灵也脆弱不堪。不死之神命令我们，要赶在他们堕入叛乱的深渊之前将他们夺回来。为此，我正在努力织网。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flame burns high, for there is strong fuel at its heart. These people have amassed many grievances. The enforcers are cruel to them, for they believe that fear eradicates treason. The officers despise them, for their clothes and hands are filthy. The quartermasters rob them and withhold what is owed to them, for their clan is not strong enough to make demands. They are vulnerable. Their hearts are vulnerable. The Undying One commands us to spin a web to catch such hearts before they plunge into the abyss of treason. And so, I am spinning the web.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La flamme, alimentée par un combustible puissant, brûle vivement. Ces gens nourrissent de nombreux griefs. Les prévôts font preuve de cruauté à leur égard, persuadés que la peur est le remède à la trahison. Les officiers les méprisent pour la saleté de leurs mains et de leurs vêtements. Les quartiers-maîtres les détroussent et les privent de leur dû, car leur clan n'est pas assez influent pour exiger quoi que ce soit. Ils sont vulnérables. Leurs cœurs sont vulnérables. L'Immortel nous ordonne de tisser une toile pour attraper ces cœurs avant qu'ils ne plongent dans les abysses de la trahison. C'est donc à moi qu'il incombe de tisser cette toile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flame burns high, for there is strong fuel at its heart. These people have amassed many grievances. The enforcers are cruel to them, for they believe that fear eradicates treason. The officers despise them, for their clothes and hands are filthy. The quartermasters rob them and withhold what is owed to them, for their clan is not strong enough to make demands. They are vulnerable. Their hearts are vulnerable. The Undying One commands us to spin a web to catch such hearts before they plunge into the abyss of treason. And so, I am spinning the web.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüreğinde yoğun bir güç biriken alevler, ortalığı yangın yerine çevirir. Bu insanların da yüreklerinde nice kederler birikmiş. İnfazcılar, korkuyla ihanetin kökünün kazınacağına inandıkları için onlara gaddarlık etmiş. İnfazcılar, kıyafetleri ve elleri kire pasa bulandığı için onları hor görmüş. Levazım subayları, klanları talepte bulunacak güçten yoksun olduğu için onları soymuş ve hakları olan her şeye el koymuş. Korunmasızlar. Yürekleri korunmaya muhtaç. Ölmeyen, ihanetin uçurumunu boylamadan önce böylesi yürekleri yakalayabilecek bir ağ örmemizi emrediyor. Bundandır ki ben de ağı örüyorum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The flame burns high, for there is strong fuel at its heart. These people have amassed many grievances.
